column1: #Text=Juwayeyi (Malawi): Those of us who are not\r
#Text=in the Security Council do not get an opportunity to\r
#Text=congratulate a delegation for assuming the presidency\r
#Text=of the Council, so it gives me particular pleasure this\r
#Text=most grateful that during your presidency you have\r
#Text=taken the initiative to hold this open session on women\r
#Text=My Government attaches great importance to the\r
#Text=protection and security of women and girls, both in\r
#Text=situations of armed conflict and in peace.
#Text=armed conflict bring untold suffering and misery to\r
#Text=communities and nations, for they entail devastating\r
#Text=and horrific levels of violence and brutality, employing\r
#Text=little distinction between soldiers and civilians and\r
#Text=wars and conflicts take place in developing countries,\r
#Text=where most of the population lives in rural areas.
#Text=Often, these conflicts are within countries, rather than\r
